flavorText: It was the explorers' only tether to reality.

foreignData.name: Nabelschnur
foreignData.text: Während der Versorgungsphase eines Spieler bezahlt dieser Spieler 2 Lebenspunkte oder bringt eine bleibende Karte, die er kontrolliert, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.

name: Umbilicus
originalText: During each player's upkeep, that player pays 2 life or returns a permanent he or she controls to owner's hand.

rulings.text: If you only have 1 life, you can’t choose the pay 2 life option.
If you don’t have a permanent to choose, you can still choose to not pay the life and then just do nothing since there is no permanent to choose.
You choose to pay the life or not pay the life during the resolution of the ability.

text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a permanent they control to its owner's hand unless they pay 2 life.
